name: PowerBI delete report from Group
description: Delete a report from Power BI using the API
author: Microsoft DevLabs
helpMarkDown: This will delete a Power BI (.pbix) file that has been uploaded to the specified Power BI group (Workspace)

inputs.name: PowerBIAPI
inputs.label: Power Bi Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Power BI API end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'Power BI API'

inputs.name: GroupName
inputs.label: Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the group to publish the file to. (Power BI Workspace Name)

inputs.name: ReportName
inputs.label: Report name to delete
inputs.helpMarkDown: The report that you want to delete from Power BI

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: ClientId
inputs.helpMarkDown: ClientId of the application that has access to the PowerBI API.
